metadata.inclusion: Ensure the rear cover is closed firmly and trigger the reed switch (close & open) 3 times within 5 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Ensure the rear cover is closed firmly and trigger the reed switch (close & open) 3 times within 5 seconds.
metadata.reset:
1. Open the rear cover to trigger the rear cover switch.
2. Trigger the reed switch (close & open) 10 times in 10 seconds.
